Posts.Content: Hi , I've been on Letrozole for nearly 2 months , I'm turning into the Incredible Hulk !!!!. What's this all about generic prescriptions ??. If I can change to something else what do I do ask my pharmacist at the drs ?. Does it say on tbe packet somewhere ??. I need to sort something out soon before I destroy all my relationships, I'm falling out with People, not sleeping , full of anxiety, get stressed very easily and am maudlin most of the time and ache but that goes without saying !Â
Posts.Title: Sandoz Letrozole - Boots unable to supply
